name: Showroom Manager
appDescription: A professional inventory management application optimized for showroom asset tracking and barcode scanning.

appReview.notes: This app is designed for inventory professionals to track assets in showrooms. The main features include photographing locations, scanning barcodes, and managing inventory data. The app works offline and syncs when internet connection is available.

privacyDescriptions.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access to take photos of locations and scan barcodes.
privacyDescriptions.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to save photos of locations to your library.
privacyDescriptions.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app needs access to save photos of locations to your library.
privacyDescriptions.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is used to associate inventory data with physical locations.
privacyDescriptions.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to barcode scanners for inventory management.
